mapper.select: select PKID , GroupName , SiteCode , SortOrder , GroupJungWon , case ParkingTimeWeek when '60' then '1시간' when '120' then '2시간' when '180' then '3시간' when '240' then '4시간' when '300' then '5시간' when '360' then '6시간' when '420' then '7시간' end as 'ParkingTimeWeek' , case ParkingTimeWeekend when '60' then '1시간' when '120' then '2시간' when '180' then '3시간' when '240' then '4시간' when '300' then '5시간' when '360' then '6시간' when '420' then '7시간' end as 'ParkingTimeWeekend' from fs_dsgroup where SiteCode = #{SiteCode} and IsDelete = 'N' order by SortOrder, GroupName
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fs_dsgroup (SiteCode, GroupName, SortOrder, IsDelete, AddDate, AddUserPKID, UpdDate, UpdUserPKID, GroupJungWon, ParkingTimeWeek, ParkingTimeWeekend) VALUES (#{SiteCode}, #{GroupName}, #{SortOrder}, 'N', sysdate(), #{AddUserPKID}, null, 0, #{GroupJungWon}, #{ParkingTimeWeek}, #{ParkingTimeWeekend})
mapper.select: select max(sortorder) from fs_dsgroup where SiteCode = #{SiteCode}

select a.SiteCode, a.pkid, b.GroupName, ItemName, FromTime, ToTime, ShortName , case AdultGBN when 0 then '어른' when 1 then '청소년' when 2 then '어린이' when 3 then '경로' end as 'AdultGBN' , case Gender when 1 then '남자' else '여자' end as 'Gender' , c.CodeName as 'Upjang' , case a.DCType when -1 then '' when 0 then '단체' when 1 then '감면' when 2 then 'CA' end as 'dcType' , a.Price as 'Price', Jungwon , Mon ,Tue ,Wed ,Thu ,Fri , Sat , Sun , a.SortOrder , a.KioskYN from fs_dsitem a left join fs_dsgroup b on a.SiteCode = b.SiteCode and a.GroupCode = b.PKID left join tblcode c on a.SiteCode = c.SiteCode and a.Upjang = c.PKID where a.SiteCode = #{SiteCode} and a.IsDelete = 'N'

select a.SiteCode, a.PKID , b.GroupName, ItemName, FromTime, ToTime, ShortName , AdultGBN , Gender , Upjang , a.DCType , a.Price as 'Price', Jungwon , Mon ,Tue ,Wed ,Thu ,Fri , Sat , Sun , a.SortOrder , a.KioskYN, NVAT as 'Nvat' from fs_dsitem a left join fs_dsgroup b on a.SiteCode = b.SiteCode and a.GroupCode = b.PKID where a.SiteCode = #{SiteCode} and a.IsDelete = 'N' and a.pkid = #{pkid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fs_dsitem (SiteCode, GroupCode, ItemName, ShortName, FromTime, ToTime, AdultGBN, Gender, Price, VAT, NVAT, Jungwon, Upjang, DCType, IsAutoAssignLocker, KioskYN, SortOrder, IsDelete, AddDate, AddUserPKID, UpdDate, UpdUserPKID, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat, Sun) VALUES (#{SiteCode}, #{GroupCode}, #{ItemName}, #{ShortName}, #{FromTime}, #{ToTime}, #{AdultGBN}, #{Gender}, #{Price}, #{vat}, #{Nvat}, #{Jungwon}, #{UpJang}, #{dcType}, 'Y', #{KioskYN}, #{SortOrder}, 'N', sysdate(), #{AddUserPKID}, null, 0, #{Mon}, #{Tue}, #{Wed}, #{Thu}, #{Fri}, #{Sat}, #{Sun})
mapper.select: select max(sortorder) from fs_dsitem where SiteCode = #{SiteCode}

select a.SiteCode, a.pkid, a.GroupCode, b.GroupName, ItemName, FromTime, ToTime, ShortName, c.CodeName as 'Upjang', c.PKID , case AdultGBN when 0 then '어른' when 1 then '청소년' when 2 then '어린이' when 3 then '경로' end as 'AdultGBN' , case Gender when 1 then '남자' else '여자' end as 'Gender' , case a.DCType when -1 then '' when 0 then '단체' when 1 then '감면' when 2 then 'CA' end as 'dcType' , a.Price as 'Price', Jungwon , Mon ,Tue ,Wed ,Thu ,Fri , Sat , Sun , a.SortOrder from fs_dsitem a left join fs_dsgroup b on a.SiteCode = b.SiteCode and a.GroupCode = b.PKID left join tblcode c on a.SiteCode = c.SiteCode and a.Upjang = c.PKID where a.SiteCode = #{SiteCode} and a.IsDelete = 'N' and b.PKID = #{value}
